mirtCAT Vignette Files
=====================

The following contains a list of links to various HTML vignettes with the `mirtCAT` package, 
generated using R markdown via the `knitr` package and hosted on Github.  

## Examples

- [Simple Survey](http://philchalmers.github.io/mirtCAT/html/simple_survey.html)
- [Define IRT parameters, and run-offline](http://philchalmers.github.io/mirtCAT/html/run-offline.html)
- [MCAT example, run-offline](http://philchalmers.github.io/mirtCAT/html/multidim-example.html)
- [MCAT example with graded response model](http://philchalmers.github.io/mirtCAT/html/run-offline-graded.html). Run with Kullback-Leiber information and ML estimation. Run-offline
- [Customizing a small number of GUI elements](http://philchalmers.github.io/mirtCAT/html/customizeGUI.html)

### User contributions

If you would like to contribute your own to the collection then feel free to send along your 
source file (`.Rmd`) to `rphilip.chalmers@gmail.com` and I'll add it to the appropriate package 
locations on Github.
